{"id":960385594,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 2 days","timestamp":1685465665,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/960385594/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        if (s.size() == 0)\n            return 0;\n        unordered_map<char, int> ma;\n        int count = 1;\n        int left = 0;\n        int right = 1;\n        ma[s[left]] = left;\n        while (right < s.size()) {\n            if (ma.find(s[right]) != ma.end())\n                //left = max(left, ma[s[right]]+1);\n                left = ma[s[right]]+1;\n            count = max(count, right-left+1);\n            ma[s[right]]=right;\n            right++;\n        }\n        return count;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false}
